description: Detects suspicious command with /dev/tcp Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Use of /dev/tcp
query: (*cat\ <\/dev\/tcp\/* OR *exec\ 3<>\/dev\/tcp\/* OR *echo\ >\/dev\/tcp\/* OR *bash\ \-i\ >&\ \/dev\/tcp\/* OR *sh\ \-i\ >&\ \/dev\/udp\/* OR *0<&196;exec\ 196<>\/dev\/tcp\/* OR *exec\ 5<>\/dev\/tcp\/* OR *\(sh\)0>\/dev\/tcp\/* OR *bash\ \-c\ 'bash\ \-i\ >&\ \/dev\/tcp\/* OR *echo\ \-e\ '#\!\/bin\/bash\\nbash\ \-i\ >&\ \/dev\/tcp\/*)
